game.description:
Das Thera-med Zahnschutz-Spiel (German for "The Thera-med toothpaste game") is an 1-player action game based on the German toothpaste "Thera-med" from the company Henkel.

The evil plaque devils are invading teeth! Stop them by brushing them off. If you brush teeth long enough they will turn blue and blue teeth can't be invaded by plaque devils. Be careful though, because if you don't brush off a plaque invader in time the tooth will turn black and you won't get any points for that tooth.

The game has 3 difficulty levels: leicht (easy), mittel (medium), and schwer (hard).
game.name: Das Thera-med Zahnschutz-Spiel
